 Rudra (Sanjay Dutt) is a tough and          
 charismatic Deputy Commissioner of          
 police of a small town called Amalapur      
 in Hyderabad. His mission statement is      
 to, clean up the city of the scum of the    
 earth and make sure that the public liveed  
 in peace undisturbed. Seeing his macho looks
 brave heart and honest nature, Sehar        
 (Prachi Desai) an unconventional beauty     
 falls in love with him.
